findings.title: External Visibility should be preferred
findings.description: Functions with public visibility should be marked as external for gas optimization.
findings.location: mint() function at Line 39, pause() function at Line 53, unpause() function at Line 67

findings.title: Invalid Error Messages found in Require Statements
findings.description: Misleading error messages in require statements affect code readability and user experience.
findings.location: burn() function at Line 82, other unspecified functions
